THE ORKIN SERVICE DIFFERENCE 
 
When you hire The Orkin Man, you can be confident that you are receiving the service you expect, from the pest control experts you can trust. 
 
Orkin Pest Control: Customized Protection 
 
Not all pest problems are the same, and not all homes need the same types of treatment. The Orkin Man is trained to identify and treat the root of your particular pest problem. Upon thorough inspection, he will create a customized treatment plan that effectively targets pest problems exactly where they appear in your home – both inside and out, all year long. Have children or pets? Trust the Orkin pest control experts to use the most responsible means of treatment application for your family. 
 
The Orkin Guarantee: Our Promise To You 
 
We’re not satisfied until you’re satisfied. Orkin means peace of mind when it comes to pest control. If pests return between regularly scheduled visits, we’ll retreat at no charge. And if we’re unable to solve your pest problem satisfactorily, we will refund your last service payment, too.

EnviroCare is located in Birmingham, Alabama. Our company offeres Lawn Care Service , Pest Control Service and Termite Control Service in the Jefferson and Shelby county area. We can help you with maintaining your lawn, shrubs and trees with services that include core aeration, lawn fertilization, fungus treatment, disease control and fire ant control. EnviroCare also specializes in pest control with our perimeter pest control program and termite protection program that provides protection with an environmentally friendly solution.

Crown Pest Control provides commercial and residential pest control throughout Birmingham and central Alabama. At Crown Pest Control, our goal is to protect your home or business from pests that may spread harmful disease and damage to your property, while delivering the highest level of customer service.  Whether you have ants, termites, roaches, rodents, or other pests, Crown Pest Control is ready to take care of all of your pest problems. With over 20 years experience, Don Green and his highly trained pest management professionals utilize the latest products and best management practices to protect your property from insect and rodent invasion.  Regular pest maintenance is an extremely important part of keeping your home or business safe and healthy year-round. Many pests, including termites, often go unnoticed until there is a full infestation. We understand insect and pest animal behaviors, and know the proper techniques needed in order to provide safe and effective control. We take a proactive approach in addressing pest problems thoroughly and efficiently.  We take pride in what we do and want to make the not-so-nice experience of dealing with pest as worry free as possible. Give us a call to discuss any pest concerns you may have, and let us provide you a solution best suited for your home or business.
Terminates General Pests. Call For An Appointment Day Or Night Until 10pm. Mr. Dean Coates Owner Operator.

We put a focus on the safety of our products and treatment methods. We aim to keep your family safe from rodents and insects, year-round. We are fully licensed and insured and our technicians are trained and friendly. If you or a friend need a reliable pest control service, give NatrureWise Pest Control a call today!

Mosquito Squad is the first, largest and most trusted name in outdoor pest control. We’ve been providing award winning service in the Birmingham area for 5 years, eliminating mosquitoes, ticks, fleas and spiders. Check out our webpage at http://birmingham.mosquitosquad.com/ or call us at 380-7755!

Best professional Pest Control company in Birmingham specializing in rodents and insects, including termites. Our solutions are safe, effective and eco-friendly. We provide 24/7 service for emergencies.

Birmingham Mosquito Control is a locally owned and operated mosquito extermination company serving Birmingham, Alabama and the surrounding area. Birmingham Mosquito Control is passionate about helping homeowners get rid of dangerous and bothersome mosquitoes so they can fully enjoy their yard.

Blanton Exterminating Co., Inc was established 1962 in Birmingham, AL by Owen Blanton and his wife, Frankie. Owen's experience in the pest control industry and his genuine love for people, combined with a strong work ethic, became the basics for the success and longevity of the company. Frankie worked in sales and performing secretarial duties. In the early days, she knew each customer by name, address and phone number! At age 90, she continues to work part-time and has the same remarkable memory and concern for "taking care of our customers!" Son-in-law, Robert Caslin, later joined the team and served customers faithfully for 35 years. Blanton Exterminating is still owned and operated by the Blanton family with the personalized service that remains our primary mission! Protecting Your Home & Health Since 1962 Blanton Exterminating Co., Inc provides residential and commercial termite and pest control services. Home maintenance services are also now available to assist in the prevention and exclusion of pests as a part of our Integrated Pest Management (IPM) program. We have the opportunity to serve customers in the greater Birmingham area, Jefferson, Shelby, Walker, and Blount Counties and beyond! Blanton Exterminating Co., Inc would like to express our appreciation to our loyal customers -- some since 1962! We invite you to become a new customer and allow us to protect your property and health from unwanted pests. Please visit our Contact Us page or call our office at 205) 798-0512!

Blanton Exterminating Co., Inc was established 1962 in Birmingham, AL by Owen Blanton and his wife, Frankie. Frankie worked in sales and performing secretarial duties. In the early days, she knew each customer by name, address and phone number! Blanton Exterminating Co., Inc was established 1962 in Birmingham, AL by Owen Blanton and his wife, Frankie. Owen's experience in the pest control industry and his genuine love for people, combined with a strong work ethic, became the basics for the success and longevity of the company. Frankie worked in sales and performing secretarial duties. In the early days, she knew each customer by name, address and phone number! At age 90, she continues to work part-time and has the same remarkable memory and concern for "taking care of our customers!" Son-in-law, Robert Caslin, later joined the team and served customers faithfully for 35 years. Blanton Exterminating is still owned and operated by the Blanton family with the personalized service that remains our primary mission! Protecting Your Home & Health Since 1962 Blanton Exterminating Co., Inc provides residential and commercial termite and pest control services. Home maintenance services are also now available to assist in the prevention and exclusion of pests as a part of our Integrated Pest Management (IPM) program. We have the opportunity to serve customers in the greater Birmingham area, Jefferson, Shelby, Walker, and Blount Counties and beyond! Blanton Exterminating Co., Inc would like to express our appreciation to our loyal customers -- some since 1962! We invite you to become a new customer and allow us to protect your property and health from unwanted pests. Please visit our Contact Us page or call our office at 205) 798-0512!

THE ORKIN SERVICE DIFFERENCE 
 
When you hire The Orkin Man, you can be confident that you are receiving the service you expect, from the pest control experts you can trust. 
 
Orkin Pest Control: Customized Protection 
 
Not all pest problems are the same, and not all homes need the same types of treatment. The Orkin Man is trained to identify and treat the root of your particular pest problem. Upon thorough inspection, he will create a customized treatment plan that effectively targets pest problems exactly where they appear in your home – both inside and out, all year long. Have children or pets? Trust the Orkin pest control experts to use the most responsible means of treatment application for your family. 
 
The Orkin Guarantee: Our Promise To You 
 
We’re not satisfied until you’re satisfied. Orkin means peace of mind when it comes to pest control. If pests return between regularly scheduled visits, we’ll retreat at no charge. And if we’re unable to solve your pest problem satisfactorily, we will refund your last service payment, too.

THE ORKIN SERVICE DIFFERENCE 
 
When you hire The Orkin Man, you can be confident that you are receiving the service you expect, from the pest control experts you can trust. 
 
Orkin Pest Control: Customized Protection 
 
Not all pest problems are the same, and not all homes need the same types of treatment. The Orkin Man is trained to identify and treat the root of your particular pest problem. Upon thorough inspection, he will create a customized treatment plan that effectively targets pest problems exactly where they appear in your home – both inside and out, all year long. Have children or pets? Trust the Orkin pest control experts to use the most responsible means of treatment application for your family. 
 
The Orkin Guarantee: Our Promise To You 
 
We’re not satisfied until you’re satisfied. Orkin means peace of mind when it comes to pest control. If pests return between regularly scheduled visits, we’ll retreat at no charge. And if we’re unable to solve your pest problem satisfactorily, we will refund your last service payment, too.

THE ORKIN SERVICE DIFFERENCE 
 
When you hire The Orkin Man, you can be confident that you are receiving the service you expect, from the pest control experts you can trust. 
 
Orkin Pest Control: Customized Protection 
 
Not all pest problems are the same, and not all homes need the same types of treatment. The Orkin Man is trained to identify and treat the root of your particular pest problem. Upon thorough inspection, he will create a customized treatment plan that effectively targets pest problems exactly where they appear in your home – both inside and out, all year long. The Orkin Guarantee: Our Promise To You 
 
We’re not satisfied until you’re satisfied. Orkin means peace of mind when it comes to pest control. If pests return between regularly scheduled visits, we’ll retreat at no charge. And if we’re unable to solve your pest problem satisfactorily, we will refund your last service payment, too.

THE ORKIN SERVICE DIFFERENCE 
 
When you hire The Orkin Man, you can be confident that you are receiving the service you expect, from the pest control experts you can trust. 
 
Orkin Pest Control: Customized Protection 
 
Not all pest problems are the same, and not all homes need the same types of treatment. The Orkin Man is trained to identify and treat the root of your particular pest problem. Upon thorough inspection, he will create a customized treatment plan that effectively targets pest problems exactly where they appear in your home – both inside and out, all year long. The Orkin Guarantee: Our Promise To You 
 
We’re not satisfied until you’re satisfied. Orkin means peace of mind when it comes to pest control. If pests return between regularly scheduled visits, we’ll retreat at no charge. And if we’re unable to solve your pest problem satisfactorily, we will refund your last service payment, too.

THE ORKIN SERVICE DIFFERENCE 
 
When you hire The Orkin Man, you can be confident that you are receiving the service you expect, from the pest control experts you can trust.

Not all pest problems are the same, and not all homes need the same types of treatment. The Orkin Man is trained to identify and treat the root of your particular pest problem. We’re not satisfied until you’re satisfied. Orkin means peace of mind when it comes to pest control. If pests return between regularly scheduled visits, we’ll retreat at no charge. And if we’re unable to solve your pest problem satisfactorily, we will refund your last service payment, too.

THE ORKIN SERVICE DIFFERENCE 
 
When you hire The Orkin Man, you can be confident that you are receiving the service you expect, from the pest control experts you can trust. 
 
Orkin Pest Control: Customized Protection 
 
Not all pest problems are the same, and not all homes need the same types of treatment. The Orkin Man is trained to identify and treat the root of your particular pest problem. Upon thorough inspection, he will create a customized treatment plan that effectively targets pest problems exactly where they appear in your home – both inside and out, all year long. Have children or pets? Trust the Orkin pest control experts to use the most responsible means of treatment application for your family. 
 
The Orkin Guarantee: Our Promise To You 
 
We’re not satisfied until you’re satisfied. Orkin means peace of mind when it comes to pest control. If pests return between regularly scheduled visits, we’ll retreat at no charge. And if we’re unable to solve your pest problem satisfactorily, we will refund your last service payment, too.

Blanton Exterminating Co., Inc was established 1962 in Birmingham, AL by Owen Blanton and his wife, Frankie. Owen's experience in the pest control industry and his genuine love for people, combined with a strong work ethic, became the basics for the success and longevity of the company. Frankie worked in sales and performing secretarial duties. In the early days, she knew each customer by name, address and phone number! At age 90, she continues to work part-time and has the same remarkable memory and concern for "taking care of our customers!" Son-in-law, Robert Caslin, later joined the team and served customers faithfully for 35 years. Blanton Exterminating is still owned and operated by the Blanton family with the personalized service that remains our primary mission! Blanton Exterminating Co., Inc was established 1962 in Birmingham, AL by Owen Blanton and his wife, Frankie. Frankie worked in sales and performing secretarial duties. In the early days, she knew each customer by name, address and phone number! At age 90, she continues to work part-time and has the same remarkable memory and concern for "taking care of our customers!" Son-in-law, Robert Caslin, later joined the team and served customers faithfully for 35 years. Blanton Exterminating is still owned and operated by the Blanton family with the personalized service that remains our primary mission! THE ORKIN SERVICE DIFFERENCE 
 
When you hire The Orkin Man, you can be confident that you are receiving the service you expect, from the pest control experts you can trust. 
 
Orkin Pest Control: Customized Protection 
 
Not all pest problems are the same, and not all homes need the same types of treatment. The Orkin Man is trained to identify and treat the root of your particular pest problem. Upon thorough inspection, he will create a customized treatment plan that effectively targets pest problems exactly where they appear in your home – both inside and out, all year long. Have children or pets? Trust the Orkin pest control experts to use the most responsible means of treatment application for your family. 
 
The Orkin Guarantee: Our Promise To You 
 
We’re not satisfied until you’re satisfied. Orkin means peace of mind when it comes to pest control. If pests return between regularly scheduled visits, we’ll retreat at no charge. And if we’re unable to solve your pest problem satisfactorily, we will refund your last service payment, too.

Blanton Exterminating Co., Inc was established 1962 in Birmingham, AL by Owen Blanton and his wife, Frankie. Frankie worked in sales and performing secretarial duties. In the early days, she knew each customer by name, address and phone number! At age 90, she continues to work part-time and has the same remarkable memory and concern for "taking care of our customers!" Son-in-law, Robert Caslin, later joined the team and served customers faithfully for 35 years.
